Indonesia - Laos Kerjasama Peningkatan SDM dan Penanganan Kejahatan Antar Negara
04 Nov 2019, 14:34 by Rizki Supermana


Indonesia - Laos Kerjasama Peningkatan SDM dan Penanganan Kejahatan Antar Negara

KBRN, Jakarta : Menteri Hukum dan HAM (Menkumham), Yasonna Laoly melakukan pertemuan dengan Menteri Hukum dan Kehakiman Laos, Seysi Sevtihong, untuk membahas sejumlah kerjasama bilateral kedua negara di bidang hukum. Yasonna Laoly menyatakan Indonesia dan Laos telah menandatangani MoU kerjasama Joint Capacity Building and Training, untuk saling berbagi kemampuan dan pengalaman dalam meningkatkan Sumber Daya Manusia (SDM) penegak hukum.
Yasonna Laoly menyebut kerjasama pengembangan SDM akan dilakukan jangka panjang, serta MoU di bidang penegakan hukum meliputi kejahatan kriminal antar negara. Seperti penegakan hukum narkotika, perdagangan manusia, terorisme, dan lainnya. Menurutnya kerjasama Indonesia dan Laos akan memperkuat bidang hukum dan HAM antar kedua negara.
"Joint Capacity Building and Training between Minister Law and Human Right Republik Indonesia dan Laos, MoU untuk jangka panjang, dalam bidang legislasi, pemberantasan tindak pidana organize crime, antar lintas negara, seperti narkotika," ungkap Yasonna Laoly kepada wartawan di Kantor Kemenkumham, Jakarta, pada Senin (4/11/2019).
Dengan disepakati MoU ini, Yasonna Laoly mengatakan penegak hukum dari Indonesia dan Laos akan mengikuti kegiatan Joint Capacity Building and Training yang melibatkan peserta dari penegak hukum kedua negara di Kementerian Hukum. KegiatanÂ Joint Capacity Building and Training diselenggarakan di Jakarta mulai 4 hingga 6 November 2019.(QQ)

Indonesia - Laos Cooperation in Enhancing Human Resources and Handling Crimes Between Countries
Nov 04 2019, 14:34 by Rizki Supermana


Indonesia - Laos Cooperation in Enhancing Human Resources and Handling Crimes Between Countries

KBRN, Jakarta: Minister of Law and Human Rights (Menkumham), Yasonna Laoly held a meeting with the Laos Minister of Law and Justice, Seysi Sevtihong, to discuss a number of bilateral cooperation between the two countries in the field of law. Yasonna Laoly said that Indonesia and Laos had signed a joint MoU on Joint Capacity Building and Training, to share capacity and experience in improving law enforcement human resources.
Yasonna Laoly said that human resources development cooperation will be carried out long-term, as well as an MoU in the field of law enforcement covering criminal crimes between countries. Such as narcotics law enforcement, human trafficking, terrorism, and others. According to him cooperation between Indonesia and Laos will strengthen the field of law and human rights between the two countries.
"Joint Capacity Building and Training between the Minister of Law and Human Rights of the Republic of Indonesia and Laos, the MoU for the long term, in the field of legislation, combating criminal acts organize crime, cross-border, such as narcotics," said Yasonna Laoly told reporters at the Kemenkumham Office, Jakarta , on Monday (11/04/2019).
With this MoU agreed, Yasonna Laoly said law enforcement from Indonesia and Laos would take part in a Joint Capacity Building and Training activity involving participants from law enforcement between the two countries at the Ministry of Law. Joint Capacity Building and Training activities will be held in Jakarta from 4 to 6 November 2019. (QQ)
